introduction.description:
Welcome to the client for an RMI based online game.
This game allows you to connect to a server an walk around a virtual, text-based version of the George Mason University campus.
You will be asked to create a character momentarily. When you do, you will join the game at the George Mason Clock, in the main quad. You will be able to see if any other players are in the same area as well as what object are on the ground and what direction you are facing.

help.description: LOOK - Shows you the area around you
SAY message - Says 'message' to any other players in the same area.
MOVE direction- Tries to walk forward once toward <direction> times.
PICKUP obect - Tries to pick up an object in the same area.
PICKUPALL - Tries to pick up all objects in the same area.
WHITEBOARD - WRITE to write a supplied argument on the whiteboard (max 120 chars), READ to read the whiteboard, or ERASE to clear the whiteboard.
INVENTORY - Shows you what objects you have collected.
QUIT - Quits the game.
HELP - Shows you all possible commands.
REDO - Repeats the last command you entered.
SHOP - Tries to enter a shop if you are near one.
WALLET - Shows you how much money you have.
VENMO - Allows you to send money to people. Try: VENMO HELP
POKE_GHOUL - Pokes the ghoul in the current room.
BRIBE_GHOUL item_name - Gives selected item to ghoul.
SORT - Sorts your inventory
R_TRADE player - Set up a trade with another player"
A_TRADE player - Accept a trade with another player
O or OFFER player object - Offer player an item
DROP object - Tries to drop an object from your pockets in the same area
